body: Just bland and bad art style, 2/10

Day 5- Manga 59*
Bro, page 3, inferior left corner, what the fuck is that? Also page 9, we found the Train Dick, one more for the collection. We have now, the Holy Dick, The Invisible Dick, The PNG Dick, The Hitler Dick and the Train Dick. Getting all of the legendary ones. I'll give it a 4/10.
See y'all next time.
4/10 I would curb stomp 10 infants to death for a shot with rei
